title: The Most Scenic Drives in America: 120 Spectacular Road Trips
description: From the Atlantic to the Pacific - 120 wonderful ways to see the magnificence of America. Exciting, carefree, and comfortable tours covering every region in the country. This book includes 120 easy-to-follow maps, 400 breathtaking photos, fascinating facts, tips, suggested side trips and much more.
author: Reader's Digest Association
